verses.text: Meanwhile, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* been \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* named \w Potiphar|strong="H6318"\w*, \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w officer|strong="H5631"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w*, \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w* \w who|strong="H6547"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w successful|strong="H6743"\w* man, serving \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* master.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* master \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*,

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w became|strong="H8334"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w personal|strong="H8334"\w* \w attendant|strong="H8334"\w*. \w Potiphar|strong="H6485"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w entrusted|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w owned|strong="H3426"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H6485"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w owned|strong="H3426"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w owned|strong="H3426"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Potiphar \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* owned \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w care|strong="H3027"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w concern|strong="H3045"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* ate. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* well-built \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w handsome|strong="H3303"\w*,

\w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w some|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* master’s wife \w cast|strong="H5375"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*.”

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w withheld|strong="H2820"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* wife. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*?”

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* Potiphar’s \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bed|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w*.

\w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, however, \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w* \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* attend \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single \w household|strong="H1004"\w* servant \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w inside|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w She|strong="H5973"\w* \w grabbed|strong="H8610"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* cloak \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*!” \w But|strong="H5800"\w* \w leaving|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* cloak \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w escaped|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* cloak \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H5127"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* house,

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* scream \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* cloak beside \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* house.”

\w So|strong="H5704"\w* Potiphar’s wife kept \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w*’s cloak \w beside|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3240"\w* master came \w home|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* she \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w same|strong="H1697"\w* story: “\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w brought|strong="H5650"\w* us \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w make|strong="H6711"\w* \w sport|strong="H6711"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H6963"\w* \w screamed|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w*, \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* cloak beside \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* house.”

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* master \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* story \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*,” \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* anger.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w master|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* thrown \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s prisoners \w were|strong="H1961"\w* confined. \w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w extended|strong="H5186"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, granting \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w* \w warden|strong="H8269"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w warden|strong="H8269"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* prisoners \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w care|strong="H3027"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w responsible|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w warden|strong="H8269"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* concern \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w*’s \w care|strong="H3027"\w*, \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w success|strong="H6743"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*.
